login.title: Please Log In
login.description: You need to be logged in to view your favorite journals.

empty.title: No Favorites Yet
empty.description: You haven't added any journals to your favorites.

about.title: About Academic Journal Index
about.p1: This website, Academic Journal Index (AJI), is a tool designed to help researchers and academics quickly find information about academic journals. You can search for journals by title or browse through different categories.
about.p2: The platform provides key metrics such as Impact Factor, CAS Partition (from the Chinese Academy of Sciences), and authority level, helping users to better evaluate and select journals for their publication needs. You can also create an account to save your favorite journals for easy access.
about.p3: All journal data is based on publicly available information and is intended for reference purposes.

search.title: Searching for Journals
search.p1: Use the search bar on the 'Search' page to find journals by name. You need to enter at least three characters to start the search. Results are sorted by impact factor by default.

browse.title: Browsing Categories
browse.p1: Go to the 'Browse' page to see all available journal categories. Click on any category to view a list of journals within it, sorted by their CAS partition ranking.

favorites.title: Managing Favorites
favorites.p1: After logging in, you can add any journal to your favorites by clicking the heart icon on its detail page. Your favorites are available on the 'My Favorites' page.

ai.title: AI-Powered Analysis
ai.p1: On each journal's detail page, click the 'Generate Analysis' button. Our AI assistant will provide a summary of the journal and suggest related publications.

feedback.title: Questions & Feedback
feedback.p1: Have a question or a suggestion to improve the website? We'd love to hear from you! Please open an issue on our GitHub repository.

auth.signInToFavorites: Sign in to access your favorites.
auth.signUpToFavorites: Sign up to start saving your favorite journals.
auth.checkCredentials: Please check your credentials and try again.
